publishing_focus.primary_focus: Bilingual Spanish-English poetry and literary prose
publishing_focus.target_audience: Poetry lovers, literary enthusiasts, and bilingual readers who appreciate the beauty of language
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: We spotlight the lyrical richness of Spanish and English, offering thoughtfully translated works that retain the essence and rhythm of the original text.
publishing_focus.example_titles: Spanish-English editions of celebrated poets, bilingual anthologies of contemporary poetry and short stories, translations of award-winning literary prose
